kw.name: Element Text Should Be
kw.msg: Verifying element 'xpath=//*[@data-test="swal-post-success"]' contains exact text 'กรุณารอเจ้าหน้าที่ตรวจสอบ!'.
kw.arg: กรุณารอเจ้าหน้าที่ตรวจสอบ!
kw.doc: Verifies that element ``locator`` contains exact the text ``expected``.

kw.doc: Takes a screenshot of the current page and embeds it into a log file.

kw.name: Close Browser
kw.doc: Closes the current browser.

test.doc: Test adding product posts on the DormDeal website from the login process to the successful submission of the post.

kw.doc: Pauses the test executed for the given time.

kw.name: Element Text Should Be
kw.msg: Verifying element 'xpath=//*[@data-test="swal-post-failed"]' contains exact text 'กรุณากรอกข้อมูลให้ครบถ้วน!'.

kw.doc: Closes the current browser.
